title: Japan says it seized Chinese vessel amid tensions with Beijing
description: The fishing boat tried to flee when ordered to stop for an inspection inside Japan's territorial waters, authorities say.
content:
Japanese authorities say they have seized a Chinese fishing vessel that tried to flee when ordered to stop for an inspection, in a move that may further fuel tensions with Beijing.
The boat was in Japan's exclusive economic zone off Nagasaki Prefectu... [1940 chars]

title: Vaping in cars with children could be banned under new plans
description: The plans are subject to a 12-week public consultation which starts on Friday.
content:
Vaping could be banned in cars carrying children, as well as in playgrounds and outside schools, according to government plans.
The plans - which are subject to a 12-week public consultation - seek to prevent smoking, vaping and the use of heated tob... [2487 chars]

title: Wuthering Heights a perfect pivot for Charli XCX, says co-writer
description: Finn Keane says working on the soundtrack was "completely different" to the pop star's Brat summer era.
content:
A songwriter who has worked with Charli XCX on her biggest hits says doing the Wuthering Heights soundtrack was the perfect pivot after their Brat summer.
Finn Keane has worked with the pop star on loads of previous projects and won a Grammy for prod... [3870 chars]

title: The US economy is growing - so where are all the jobs?
description: As hiring rates and job openings drop, some worry a tough job market could be here to stay.
content:
When 42-year-old Jacob Trigg lost his job as a project manager in the tech industry he didn't think it would take too long to find a new one - he always had before.
But more than 2,000 job applications later he is still hunting, trying to make ends m... [4995 chars]

title: FA Cup fourth round: 10 things to look out for this weekend
description: Burnley have the chance of a Cup run, Leicester fear an unwelcome repeat and Brighton fans get a raw deal
